thread.title: Former Kerala, Bihar Governor R S Gavai is dead
thread.title_full: Former Kerala, Bihar Governor R S Gavai is dead - Qatar Tribune - First with the news and whats behind it

author: Nagpur R S Gavai, veteran
title: Former Kerala, Bihar Governor R S Gavai is dead
text:
Nagpur R S Gavai, veteran Dalit leader and former Governor of Kerala and Bihar, died on Saturday afternoon after a prolonged illness at a private hospital in Nagpur, the second capital of Maharashtra.
He was 86 and survived by wife Kamal and two sons. His elder son Justice Bhushan Gavai is a Bombay High Court judge of Nagpur Bench and younger son Rajendra is leader of Republican Party of India (Gavai faction).
The body was taken to Justice Gavai's residence in the city and later kept at Deekshabhoomi, the historic place where B R Ambedkar embraced Buddhism in 1956, for the public to pay the last respects, his family said.
The funeral will take place at his native village in Daryapur in Amravati district on Sunday with state honours. (PTI)
